name: travel-tourism-template
description: Template Travel/Tourism con effetti WOW - Demo completa e interattiva

scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: npx csso css/main.css --output css/main.min.css && npx csso css/animations.css --output css/animations.min.css
scripts.minify-js: npx uglify-js js/app.js --compress --mangle --output js/app.min.js && npx uglify-js js/animations.js --compress --mangle --output js/animations.min.js
scripts.optimize: npm run build && npx imagemin images/* --out-dir=images/optimized

author: Template Developer
